How it all began.

Water Engineering Technologies began in 1996, and we pioneered bottle-less water dispensers with our first installs in 1998. In 2002, the company was asked by Alaska Airlines to figure out an impossible challenge - remove arsenic from the water in Yakutat, Alaska airport. With less than 60 days to complete the project and under threat of state shutdown, the team completed the challenge and our reputation for providing the cleanest water to almost anywhere, was born.

Where are we now.

Since that first project, we have expanded our offering with office water services, providing clean on-demand water for thousands of offices, healthcare facilities, and industrial locations.

As our customer, we are committed to providing you with the highest performance water purification systems in the marketplace combining our product expertise with best-in-class service. Weâ€™ll install sleek, modern-looking, bottle-less water system anywhere in your building at a fraction of the cost of bottled water. More importantly, we'll inspect your system quarterly and ensure your system is functioning at no additional cost. Healthier, reliable, and cleaner water without the hassle, storage or high cost of bottled water.

Let us show you how easy it is to get healthier, cleaner water.
